nodes.text: Garma was a female Arcona who lived on the Colossus refueling station during the era of the New Republic. She had yellow eyes and blue skin.

Garma was a character developed for the Star Wars Resistance animated series, first appearing in the episode "The Triple Dark". She was voiced by Greg Proops. In the script and an early cut of the season one finale "No Escape: Part 2", Garma was to encounter Kazuda Xiono in a doorway during a corridor-flooding sequence, pinching his cheek and calling him "an adventurous one" after Xiono tackled her to get her out of the way of the crashing waves.
